node.title: Robonomics Frontier
node.description: As a result of the summer Kusama crowdloans, Robonomics reached the Top-10 projects of the Polkadot ecosystem. Before the next wave of auctions, the projectâ€™s developers decided to deploy and maintain a functionally identical network.

node.title: Robobank. Accept any Polkadot token in automation services
node.description: Robonomics developers have come up with a solution based on the Polkadot architecture that will allow any parachain to get access to IoT device management with payment in a native token

node.title: Trajectory of Robonomics Development 2021, Part 1
node.description: The Polkadot architecture is becoming explicit and complete, which should allow us, as parachain developers, to shift our focus from maintaining improvements in Polkadot dependencies (the substrate framework, cumulus and other), and move on to increasing the functionality of our parachain.

node.title: AMA session at Robonomics community, Dec 11
node.description: AMA session with Sergei Lonshakov, software architect at Robonomics.Network. We discussed further development roadmap, and answered the most frequent questions from the community members.

node.title: Rewards for researchers, developers and engineers
node.description: Developers, engineers and researchers as the core drive force of the robotics industry get rewards for research and development activities based on Robonomics Network. Core Robonomics DAO developers allocated 5000 XRT for incentivising community.

node.title: Rewards for Ambassadors & Influencers
node.description: Robonomics Network concept is quite wide and needs to be explained by people with various backgrounds and expertise. Thus, Robonomics DAO allocated 5000 XRT for rewarding influencers all over the world, thatâ€™d make overviews of the Robonomics Network in different formats and describe the basic concept for the outer world.

node.title: Community incentive program
node.description: With the launch of Robonomics Web Services beta test, Robonomics Network is shifting to higher growth pace. In order to reward Robonomics community, Robonomics DAO came up with the idea of a community incentive program.

node.title: Robonomics Parachain Lease Offering
node.description: Robonomics developers aim to allocate $720,000 for a 2-year lease of a slot in the Kusama network. This underlying amount of XRT will be distributed among the KSM holders who will support the project with their tokens at the upcoming auction of Polkadotâ€™s wild cousin.
